articles.description: In an unfortunate incident, Punjabi singer Diljaan passed away after he met with a fatal road accident on Tuesday (March 30) morning, an ANI report said. According to reports, the singer died in the road accident at Jandiala Guru near Amritsar today.

articles.description: Ranbir Kapoor was spotted outside Aarti Shetty's residence in Mumbai on Monday. Sara Ali Khan was also snapped in the city.
